page.title: 10Marnhull's shopping patterns
page.content: The majority of people purchase their MEAT from the local butcher,about half having it delivered. The local CHEMIST,situated immediately opposite the Doctor's surgery,is used by 90% of the population. GARDEN and D.I.Y. items are bought out of the village,mostly at Sturminster Newton and Yeovil. CLOTHES & FURNITURE are mainly bought in Yeovil,although Bournemouth is quite popular for clothing. CONCLUSION The shops are patronised quite well by the local people.Of the small towns within 7 miles,Sturminster Newton is easily the most popular. Yeovil is used a little more than Sturminster for large monthly purchases of groceries.82% of homes have freezers.
